name: The Citadel of Silent Chimes
description:
"A fort stood alone in ashen land"
"Touched not by strife nor by time"
"A stronghold carved not by human hand"
"The Citadel of Silent Chimes"

You have made a long and arduous journey to visit the famous Citadel of Silent Chimes. However, the adventure that awaits you there is not one you could have foreseen, even in your wildest dreams...
